entry.title: [ERI1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack E101
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 17, 07:00 - 14:00 UTC

Feb 7, 04:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare metal offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 17/03/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/03/2025 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack E101 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG8][Virtual Private Servers] - Hosts incident notification
entry.content:
Feb 25, 12:20 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on Strasbourg region has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 25/02/2025 09:33 UTC
End time : 25/02/2025 12:16 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Feb 25, 12:08 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : 2 of the 3 hosts have been fixed and are available again. Our teams are still working on the last host.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 25, 11:36 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Virtual Private Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issues on this region .

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 25/02/2025 09:33 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : 3 hosts are impacted by this incident.
Customers Impact : Some instance are unavailable for customers.
Root Cause : This incident is due to a problem with the cooling system.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS1][Dedicated Servers] - Room T01B incident notification
entry.content:
Feb 25, 05:55 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on room T01B has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 25/02/2025 03:39 UTC
End time : 25/02/2025 05:50 UTC
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling module issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Feb 25, 05:47 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service.

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : The majority of the servers are no longer impacted.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are currently working on the remaining impacted servers.
We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 25, 03:13 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offer in the specified room.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 25/02/2025 03:39 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in room Room T01B are temporarily unreachable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their dedicated servers located in room T01B.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling module issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilized to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Feb 25, 03:08 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Dedicated servers offer.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
